title: Flash Bug
body: I was just wondering if anyone else is having problems with {{summoner:4}}  because this has occurred with me a few time were i was playing different champs and when i was CCed i spam my {{summoner:4}}  to get out but as i do this my {{summoner:4}}  goes off and flashes me in the same place now you may be thinking that it was just  that my mouse is wrong but its has happened 4 times since the new update and i have seen it occur to other people in my game. this bug only occurs on blue side from what i have seen.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Was your mouse over any of the UI elements? (Map, etc)

This can cause issues with targeting of spells and/or abilities.
